content: All: A heads up that in San Diego we'll be holding a bit of a different kind of connectathon stream from other ones we've held. This explores how to use FHIR to create a patient managed exchanged between 2 other parties that manage their information, and can trust each other. Participants are welcome
Going to Georges at the Cove around 6:30 for those interested. :- )
For the future, this sort of post is best done on social
